title: Firebrand

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Douse a player in gasoline or hose down a doused player each night.

- Douse a player in gasoline, hose down a doused player, or ignite your doused targets at night.

fields.name: General Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot perform your ability on night one.

- If you are controlled on night one, your ability will fail.

fields.name: Dousing Attributes:
fields.value:
- Only non-Town roles will know if they were doused in gasoline. However, they will not know if they were hosed down.

- You will receive the names of all of your doused players at the end of each night.

fields.name: Hosing Down Attributes:
fields.value:
- Hosing down a player removes your gasoline from them.

- You will not remove another Firebrand's gasoline or an Arsonist's gasoline.

fields.name: Igniting Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only ignite your doused targets once.

- You will not ignite another Firebrand's doused targets or an Arsonistâ€™s doused targets, nor will they ignite yours.

- When you ignite your doused targets, if you are also dousing or hosing down a player, the ignition will occur second in the priority order, meaning you will douse or hose down your target first, then you will ignite your doused targets second.
